name: slam
actor_no_arg: You slam your head into the desk or the nearest wall.
others_no_arg: $n slams their head against the wall.
actor_found_target: You grab $N and slam their skull into the wall.
others_found: $n grabs $N's skull and violently slams it against the wall.
target_found: $n grabs you by the hair and forces your head to collide with a wall.
actor_auto: Who are you going to slam?
others_auto: $n makes a fist and begins to punch $mself in the face.
